pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:5.1: 30. The training rule on the end of the robe-making season
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:6.2: At that time a lay follower had built a dwelling for the Order.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:6.3: He wanted to give out-of-season robe-cloth to both Orders at the presentation ceremony for that dwelling.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:6.4: Just then both Orders had done the robe-making ceremony.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:6.5: That lay follower then approached the Order and asked it to make an end of the robe-making season.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:6.7: Soon afterwards the Master gave a teaching and addressed the monks,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:6.8: “Monks, I allow you to end the robe-making season.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:6.9: And it should be ended in this way.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:6.10: A competent and capable monk should inform the Order:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:7.1: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Order to listen.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:7.2: If it seems appropriate to the Order, the Order should end the robe-making season.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:8.1: Please, Venerables, I ask the Order to listen.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:8.2: The Order ends the robe-making season.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:8.3: Any monk who approves of ending the robe-making season should remain silent.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:8.4: Any monk who does not approve should speak up.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:9.1: The robe-making season has been ended by the Order. The Order approves and is therefore silent. I will remember it thus.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:10.1: Then that lay follower went to the Order of nuns and asked them to end the robe-making season.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:10.3: aiming to get robe-cloth for herself, blocked the Order from ending the robe-making season.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:10.4: That lay follower complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:10.5: “How could the nuns not end the robe-making season for us?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:11.1: The nuns heard the complaints of that lay follower.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:11.2: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:11.3: “How could Venerable Thullanandā block a legitimate ending of the robe-making season?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:11.4: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:11.7: How can the nun Thullanandā block a legitimate ending of the robe-making season?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:11.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:11.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:12.1: ‘If a nun blocks a legitimate ending of the robe-making season, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:13.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:14.1: A legitimate ending of the robe-making season:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:14.2: a complete Order of nuns brings it to an end.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:15.2: if she blocks it, thinking, “What can be done so that the robe-making season doesn’t end?” she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:16.2: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as legitimate, and she blocks it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:16.3: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure if it is, and she blocks it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:16.4: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as illegitimate, and she blocks it, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:16.5: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as legitimate, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:16.6: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure if it is, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:16.7: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as illegitimate, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:17.4: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:18.1: The tenth training rule is finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:18.2: The third chapter on nakedness is finished.
